title: Bunte Burger
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: In addition to its food truck which began service in 2014, Bunte Burger opened this storefront in 2015. Serves a variety of organic vegan burgers plus wedges and dips, and beverages like green smoothie and lemonade. Reservation suggested. Its truck parks at different locations - check webpage schedule. From 2015 Nov 23 to Dec 23 it is operating a stall at Roncalliplatz Christmas Market selling Christmas burger spiced with gingerbread, 3 sisters chili with French bread, and gingerbread covered with chocolate.
